Replace.Text: Holy Tree Domain ♩♪
Divine Domain: Holy Tree
Heimdall
I always think that only with perfect theories as the cornerstone can perfect research results be achieved. I prefer the process of deriving theories to the pursuit of results.
Extreme God Realm

After creating a capital, you will immediately gain Okuninushi, Heimdall, and the Ring of Reason, and you do not need the initial high [ICON_Gold] maintenance fee, and you will gain +100% [ICON_Production] productivity when training this unit. +500% [ICON_Production] productivity when building academy and industrial zone, and you will gain a zone slot after completion. After winning the battle, you will gain [ICON_Gold] gold and [ICON_Science] technology value equal to 200% of the [ICON_Strength] combat strength of the killed unit (at standard speed). You can form legions earlier (Codex Municipal) and the city does not need a military academy, you can directly train legions and armies. The training cost of legions and armies is reduced by 10%
That theorist probably doesn't know the joy of practice... - Okuninushi
Believe in science
Dislikes civilizations with low research values
Well, I will help you
I'm collecting experimental data and have no time.
I would like to invite you to test some new combat weapons
OK, let's start now.
It's okay, don't worry about it
Don't underestimate scientists
It's a pity that you have no research value.
Well, my experiment is in need of some manpower.
I'm doing an experiment, please don't disturb me.
This is a postcard of a horse farm. You should like it, right?
I don't have time for these.
You are not welcome here!
Heimdall, I have to sort out the experimental data now. Is there anything I can do for you?
This is our city, you can visit it at will
Yeah, I'm happy to
Let's exchange cities. I'll visit you when I have time.
I want to discuss something with you. Are you willing to devote yourself to science and become my research subject?
You want to attack a scientist?
Well, I hope you can take action.
Your expansion has seriously affected my experimental site. I hope you can go somewhere else.
Well, at your own risk
I know I can't stop your curiosity, but stealing secrets won't do you any good. The less you know, the better...
Then try again.
Science is the truth, please stop spreading your cult theories!
Are you so unwilling to give up?
Science...rejected me...
Thanks
Thanks
Thanks
It seems that a more reasonable reason is needed
It seems that a more reasonable reason is needed
It seems that a more reasonable reason is needed
Why are you so dismissive of science?
Heimdall is very dissatisfied with your technological lag
Unit +15 [ICON_Gold] Gold
